title: Introducing JSDayIE 2019!
summary: Introducing JSDayIE 2019: The first tech conference dedicated exclusively to the JavaScript and its community in Ireland!

title: JSDayIE 2019 CFP now open!
summary: The JSDayIE 2019 CFP is now open! Don’t miss out on this opportunity to share your story and your expertise with the rest of the JS community

title: 10 Reasons to sponsor JSDayIE 2019
summary: Sponsoring JSDayIE offers a unique opportunity to expose your brand and find talent specialized in JavaScript technologies in Ireland

title: Sponsor Spotlight: Stelfox
summary: Meet our Platinum Plus sponsor: Stelfox. Stelfox IT Recruitment is a technology specialist recruitment agency based in Dublin, Galway, Cork and Berlin

title: Sponsor Spotlight: Microsoft Ireland
summary: Meet our Diamond sponsor: Microsoft Ireland. Microsoft employs over 2500 people in Ireland who strive to deliver their mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

title: Sponsor Spotlight: HMH
summary: Meet our Silver sponsor: HMH. Houghton Mifflin Harcourt is a publisher of textbooks, instructional technology materials, assessments, reference works, and fiction and non-fiction for both young readers and adults.

title: Sponsor Spotlight: Oliver Wyman
summary: Meet our Gold sponsor: Oliver Wyman. Oliver Wyman is an international management consulting firm with a large focus on banking and financial services.

title: Sponsor Spotlight: Workday
summary: Meet our Platinum sponsor: Workday. Workday is an on‑demand financial management and human capital management software vendor. In 2018, Workday was voted the #2 Best Place to Work in Ireland.
